data.enText: having no purpose because there is no chance of success

data.chText: 徒然的尝试 / 练习 / 手势

data.enText: Their efforts to revive him were futile.
data.chText: 他们努力使他苏醒，但失败了。

data.enText: It would be futile to protest.

example: futile years after her artistic peak

example.ex: He brought his arm up in a futile attempt to ward off the blow...
example.tran: 他扬起胳膊徒劳地想要挡住这一拳。

example.ex: It would be futile to sustain his life when there is no chance of any improvement.
example.tran: 如果没有任何好转的机会，继续维持他的生命也是无益的。

value.def: If you say that something is futile, you mean there is no point in doing it, usually because it has no chance of succeeding.
